channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Stablecoins and CBDCs might play 'meaningful role' in payments — Visa CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Visa began working on a blockchain interoperability project in Sept. 2021 to support CBDC and stablecoin adoption but few updates have been made since.

item.title: Breaking: BlockFi uncensored financials reportedly shows $1.2B FTX exposure
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: The documents previously censored financial information relating to FTX and Alameda Research, but uncensored copies were released by mistake.

item.title: Court to hear oral arguments in Grayscale’s lawsuit against the SEC in March
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: Grayscale had expected it wouldn’t be able to voice arguments until the second quarter, and is calling the quicker timeline “welcome news.”

item.title: Casual gamers a ‘critical’ audience for blockchain games: GameFi execs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: Many casual gamers are still reluctant to play games that use blockchain tech, but gaming execs believe one good game could change that.

item.title: Arizona lawmakers seek to make crypto a tax-exempt property
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Should the bill pass the legislature, Arizona voters will decide whether virtual currency is tax-exempt as part of a November 2024 ballot measure.

item.title: Surojit Chatterjee to retain 249,315 shares of Coinbase stock after departing company
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The chief product officer will receive a healthy severance package as he departs from his role at the exchange.

item.title: New ‘Celsius token’ may be used to repay creditors: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: It was suggested that the token could be part of a reorganization that would turn Celsius into a publicly traded, U.S.-regulated company.

item.title: Ethereum futures and options data reflect investors’ growing confidence in ETH price
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: ETH price struggles to flip $1,700 to support, but key derivatives data show bulls making plans to break through the resistance.

item.title: Blockstream raises $125M to finance expanded Bitcoin mining operations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: Bitcoin miners came under significant pressure during the bear market; however, Blockstream said institutional hosting customers were more “resilient.”

item.title: UK gov't is hiring a central bank digital currency lead for Treasury team
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The team lead will determine the “strategic direction” for Treasury’s efforts to develop a digital pound in line with the U.K. government’s agenda.

item.title: Solana (SOL) price rally could fizzle out due to weak fundamentals
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Solana’s usage data and ecosystem development do not support the recent bullish rally, raising the probability of a SOL price correction.

item.title: EU lawmakers vote for more restrictive capital requirements on banks holding crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Banks could be required to hold a “risk-weighted exposure amount” of up to 1,250% of capital based on exposure to crypto if the full parliament passes the measures.

item.title: Opinion: Crypto exchanges keep failing, so why do we still trust Changpeng Zhao?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Forman
item.description: New data indicates Binance’s stablecoin, BUSD, has been undercollateralized at times by more than $1 billion. Yet, few have questioned CEO Changpeng Zhao.

item.title: Nicholas Merten of DataDash predicts a 'cold winter' for the crypto market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Benjamin Pirus
item.description: Episode four of Cointelegraph’s Crypto Trading Secrets podcast features an interview with Nicholas Merten, who shared his opinions on the crypto bear market and more.

item.title: 3 reasons why the MANA and SAND metaverse token rally could end soon
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Apple’s rumored VR headset launch appeared to fuel a sharp rally in metaverse tokens, but data suggests that the momentum is unsustainable.

item.title: Why is crypto pumping? Watch The Market Report live
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Adrian J. Permal
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Market Report, Cointelegraph’s resident experts discuss the reasons behind the latest crypto pump.

item.title: Bitcoin halts volatility at $23K as BTC hodlers see mass return to profit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Short-term and long-term investors alike are back in the black, with Bitcoin undecided on where to go next.

item.title: 7 people who could be Bitcoin creator Satoshi Nakamoto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: To this day, the exact identity of Satoshi Nakamoto remains a mystery.

item.title: SushiSwap passes 100% fee relocation, 10.9M SUSHI clawback proposals
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: 100% of trading fees on the platform will soon be redirected to the SushiSwap treasury for maintenance and expenses.

item.title: Ethereum vs. Bitcoin: ETH price risks 20% drop if key support level breaks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: ETH’s price has repeatedly failed to break above key trendline resistance, and now Ethereum risks losing strong technical support as well.

item.title: 7 ways to address the dev talent shortage in the crypto industry
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: The crypto industry isn’t unique in facing a developer shortage, but it can develop some unique solutions to the problem.

item.title: Reformed ‘altcoin slayer’ Eric Wall on shitposting and scaling Ethereum
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Fenton

item.title: Amid crypto winter, central banks rethink in-house digital currencies
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shiraz Jagati
item.description: In recent months, four countries that had previously initiated major CBDC pilot programs have scrapped their adoption plans altogether.

item.title: Blockchain developer QuickNode raises $60M at $800M valuation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sam Bourgi
item.description: Like other blockchain developers, QuickNode is pivoting sharply into Web3 — a sector that has attracted keen venture capital interest.

item.title: Listen-and-Earn allows Bitcoin payments for podcasters and listeners
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The Fountain podcasting app announced a partnership with ZEBEDEE to allow podcast creators and listeners the ability to earn Bitcoin for their time spent with content.

item.title: TradFi and DeFi come together — Davos 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: On this episode of Decentralize With Cointelegraph, the team reflects on their week in Davos covering the World Economic Forum as crypto and TradFi continue to collide.

item.title: Binance holds token collateral and user funds on same wallet by ‘mistake’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Binance previously said the firm’s corporate holdings are recorded in separate accounts and should not form part of the proof-of-reserves calculations.

item.title: 5 quick steps Markets Pro members used for 120x returns trading the news in 2021 & 2022
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: Successful investors in the bear market turn to advanced machine learning algorithms and news indicators for trade opportunities.

item.title: What is the Bitcoin Loophole, and how does it work?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arunkumar Krishnakumar
item.description: Anyone can make money trading Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies thanks to Bitcoin Loophole, a well-known automated trading platform.

item.title: Uniswap holders propose ditching Ethereum for BNB Chain to deploy v3 protocol
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: 80% of UNI holders voted to support the deployment of the Uniswap protocol’s v3 to BNB Chain, while the remaining voters voted against the move.
